text: Sangrur Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 108) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Sangrur district, Punjab state, India. Constituency consists of Sangrur, Bhawanigarh and other nearby villages. Current MLA from constituency is Vijay Inder Singla of INC preceded by Parkash Chand Garg of Shiromani Akali Dal. == MLAs == {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="margin:auto; margin:auto;" |+Members of Legislative Assembly |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | |1957 | Rajinder Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | |1962 | Hardit Singh | Communist Party of India |- |style="background- color:darkorange" | |1967 | J.
